headline: Chipmaker Onsemi misses quarterly revenue estimates, shares fall
summary: Chipmaker Onsemi missed Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter revenue on Monday, with its business ​segments declining as much as 17%, hurt by ‌a persistent inventory glut. Shares of the Phoenix, Arizona-based company fell nearly ‌6% in extended trading. Onsemi has been grappling with an inventory glut as its customers work through excess chip stockpiles ordered during the supply chain crunch.

Onsemi has been grappling with an inventory glut as its customers work through excess chip stockpiles ordered during the supply chain crunch.

headline: Onsemi Stock Drops On Soft Sales Forecast After In-Line Q4
summary: On Semiconductor offered a soft sales forecast for the first quarter after an in-line Q4. Onsemi stock fell late.

raw.headline: Onsemi Stock Drops On Soft Sales Forecast After In-Line Q4
raw.summary: On Semiconductor offered a soft sales forecast for the first quarter after an in-line Q4. Onsemi stock fell late.

headline: onsemi (NASDAQ:ON) Reports Q4 In Line With Expectations, Inventory Levels Improve
summary: Analog chips maker onsemi (NASDAQ:ON) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, but sales fell by 11.2% year on year to $1.53 billion. On the other hand, next quarter’s revenue guidance of $1.49 billion was less impressive, coming in 1.4% below analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.64 per share was 2.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

Its non-GAAP profit of $0.64 per share was 2.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: ON Semiconductor Corp.: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: On a per-share basis, the Scottsdale, Arizona-based company said it had net income of 45 cents. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were 64 cents per share. The results surpassed Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: ON Semiconductor Corp.: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: On a per-share basis, the Scottsdale, Arizona-based company said it had net income of 45 cents. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were 64 cents per share. The results surpassed Wall Street expectations.

headline: onsemi Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Results
summary: Returned $1.4 billion of 2025 Free Cash Flow through share repurchasesSCOTTSDALE, Ariz., Feb. 09, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- onsemi (the “Company”) (Nasdaq: ON) today announced its fourth quarter and fiscal year 2025 results: Results Highlights: Fourth quarter revenue of $1,530 millionFourth quarter GAAP gross margin and non-GAAP gross margin of 36.0% and 38.2%, respectivelyFourth quarter GAAP operating margin and non-GAAP operating margin of 13.1% and 19.8%, respectivelyFourth quarter GAAP dilute
